page.title: 04West Bromwich Buses
page.content: The bus service in our area is run by {West Midlands Passenger Transport.}We have two types of buses. We have {single deckers}which hold 43 passengers and{double deckers}which hold 76 passengers. Adults pay full fare but children pay half fare between the age of 4 and 16 but{Old {Age Pensioners}travel free with a bus pass. You can get{Daytripper tickets from the{Enquiries Office}which are 75p for children and Â£1.75 for adults, which will enable you to travel anywhere in the{West Midlands.}You must have the correct fare to put in the slot when you get on a bus. The driver scans it, if it is correct a ticket comes out of a machine. The buses run from about 5.00 am to about 12.00am for seven days a week throughout the year.
